name: Nephites
startIntroPart1: The Nephites are a people who where brought from the old world into a new promised land. Long ago their brothers dissented from the traditions.
startIntroPart2: Stay strong in this new world and praise God!
declaringWar: May God be with our people during this war.
attacked: So, it has come to this.
defeated: Were it not for the wickedness of this people, God may have been with us. Adieu.
introduction: We are the Nephites. We are pleased to find others in this promised land.
neutralHello: Pleasure to see you, good friend.
hateHello: What is it you afflict our people with?
tradeRequest: We wish for an exchange we believe may benefit us both.
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Classical era]>
[-50]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities connected to capital]

name: Lamanites
startIntroPart1: The Lamanites are a people who where brought from the old world into a new promised land. Long ago they dissented from the traditions they carried with them to pursue bloodshed.
startIntroPart2: You will get the blood you seek.
declaringWar: Finally, let us show you our raw power!
defeated: We fight to the bitter end!
introduction: We are Lamanites. Do not get in our way and we will spare your flocks and pastures.
hateHello: I seethe at the sight of you.
tradeRequest: We wish for an exchange of our substance.
uniqueName: People of Laman, Disenters from the Nephites
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
